results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 9bfd97437cac4e1bb31ea678fa3faccb. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 865981ab60b6417f825629b103a91061:

2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
